document.full_text: formula one's first russian grand prix is on track for 2014 and will complement rather than hinder the winter olympics in sochi that year, a top official said on tuesday.
document.title: sochi says russian gp on track, ioc to review plans
lines_and_colors: formula one's first russian grand prix is on track for 2014 and will complement rather than hinder the winter olympics in sochi that year, a top official said on tuesday.
